message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product which has been valued at $800000 by you. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, we believe it would be beneficial for both parties if we could reach an agreement. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $750000. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and a dedicated customer support package. Please let us know if this proposal meets your expectations or if you have any concerns that we can address.

I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $680000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me, and it would allow us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. We understand your perspective and are committed to finding a solution that works for both of us. In light of your offer, we would like to propose a counteroffer of $700000 for the product. This price still reflects the high value of the product while accommodating your budget considerations. We believe this is a fair compromise that respects the product's worth and aligns with your valuation. We look forward to your feedback on this proposal.

I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'd like to propose $690000. This is the highest price I'm willing to pay for the product, and I believe it's a fair price considering its value to me.
